welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Unguia, Colombia! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious food, and stunning natural beauty, our charming city has so much to offer. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Unguia has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Apartado Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Apartado Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network while waiting for their flight.
